item.title: Dark Turns Light
item.description: The site started with a dark background color for all pages, but I wasn't satisfied with how the language pages looked. I think a light background makes the...

item.title: Free Programming Books
item.description: Links to freely available programming books from the EbookFoundation/free-programming-books GitHub repository are added to language pages.

item.title: Programming Languages Influence Network
item.description: This interactive network graph shows influence relations of programming languages based on data from the Wikidata project.
